#nametype [nametype]: 112

summoned with #370 Call Jahi (Conjuration 5)

The Jahi, 'whore', was once a wife or concubine of the Destructive Spirit. It is a seducer of men and an apostle of Druj, falsehood. The Jahi are sent to spread wickedness and evil thoughts to the realms of men.
